cvdos1.0.description:
# Castlevania: Dawn of Sorrow Archipelago Version 1.0 #
- Initial Release
## Fixes ##
* Fixed bosses that drop Ability Souls activating their ability when they didn't give you their soul
* Fixed some weapons/armors not being properly receivable
* Fixed a couple checks in Demon Guest House missing logic
* Fixed a crash when saving while using Doppelganger B
## Known Issues ##
* None so Far
cvdos1.0.title: Castlevania: Dawn of Sorrow Archipelago v1.0

cvdos1.0.1.description:
# Castlevania: Dawn of Sorrow Archipelago Version 1.0.1 #
## New Settings ##
* ``Boost Speed``:  Increases Soma's base walking speed by 33%
## Changes ##
* The Demon Guest House Number Puzzle 1 check is now logically accessible from the Village side without access to the rest of the puzzle
## Fixes ##
* Fixed the Big Room checks in Dark Chapel not being properly assigned to the big room in logic
* Probably fixed some client apworld issues
* Fixed being unable to turn on Abilities if they were disabled in the menu
## Known Issues ##
* None so Far
cvdos1.0.1.title: Castlevania: Dawn of Sorrow Archipelago v1.0.1

cvdos1.1.description:
# Castlevania: Dawn of Sorrow Archipelago Version 1.1 #
## New Settings ##
* ``One-Screen Mode``: Allows the entire game to be playable with just the bottom screen. ``SELECT`` displays the map. Top screen always displays enemy info and cannot be changed
* Soul Randomizer + Soulsanity
  Souls can either be shuffled amongst enemies or made into checks
  Soulsanity is split into 3 difficulties by the rarity of the soul drop rate
* ``Guaranteed Souls``: Allows you specify which Souls you want to *always* be in the item pool as opposed to being selected at random.
* ``Shuffle Starting Warp Room``: Shuffles which Warp Room is activated by default.
* ``Open Drawbridge``: Opens the drawbridge in Lost Village by default, allowing for earlier access to the rest of the castle.

## Changes ##
* The filler pool will no longer generate duplicate pieces of equipment
* The Wizardry Lab celing secret can now be logically gotten with jumping + Puppet or Bat Company
* Black Panther is now in logic for certain jumps
* Logic now accounts for the boosted movement speed option (mainly in Lost Village)
* Soul Cans now use the respective color of their Soul type, instead of all being blue
* The text when picking up an AP item will now use the corresponding item class color
* Goal settings (and soulsanity) are now stored in the Slot Data for tracker use
* Yoko's Soul Release has been completely disabled
* Laevatain, Joyeuse, and Halberd have had their Synthesis recipes changed to not require Souls that are otherwise required for progression (so they can be in logic)
* Removed the blockade before the Warp Room in Lost Village
* UT is fully supported
## Fixes ##
* Fixed Gorgon soul being misspelled as Goron soul
* Fixed Magic Seals on the Garden of Madness central area and Abyss Sand Area checks not properly setting the flag for having checked them
* Fixed the ``Silenced Ruins: Mirror World`` not checking for Paranoia's soul
* Fixed Hammer's second shop upgrade never being accessible (due to the removal of the cutscene where you get Mina's Talisman), the upgrade now occurs when you enter the room where the Mina's talisman check is normally.
## Known Issues ##
* None so Far
cvdos1.1.title: Castlevania: Dawn of Sorrow Archipelago Version 1.1

cvdos1.2.description:
# Castlevania: Dawn of Sorrow Archipelago Version 1.2 #
## New Settings ##
* ``Shop Randomizer``: Randomizes Hammer's shop items
* ``Deathlink``: Standard deathlink. Kills others when you die, kills you when others die.
* ``Enemy Drop Shuffle``: Randomizes what items enemies drop
* `` Experience Percent``: Multiplies EXP by the percent specified
* ``Soul Drop Percent``: Multiplies enemies' base soul drop chance by the percent specified
* Music Randomizer: Randomizes music
  Area music shuffle + boss music shuffle

## Changes ##
* You can no longer receive items while a text prompt is onscreen (This fixes some minor issues stemming from receiving a new Soul while text was up)
* The Bestiary (and top screen enemy display) will now show when a Soul has been checked, instead of obtained, if playing on Soulsanity
* You are no longer stopped from picking up an item if you have 9 of that item
* Removed yoko's yapping after defeating flying armor
* You can now add all souls of a rarity to guaranteed souls
## Fixes ##
* Fixed the Iron Golem soul not logically requiring you to use Imp
* Fixed some logic in Subterranean Hell
## Known Issues ##
* None so Far
cvdos1.2.title: Castlevania: Dawn of Sorrow Archipelago v1.2

cvdos1.2.1.description:
# Castlevania: Dawn of Sorrow Archipelago Version 1.2.1 #
## New Settings ##
N/A
## Changes ##
* Shop randomizer can no longer roll additional potions, mind ups, or claymores (as Hammer is always guaranteed to sell these items)
* Adjusted the Killer Fish and Needles soul in Sub. Hell to require Rahab as they can be underwater and impossible to damage with base weaponry
## Fixes ##
* Swapped the descriptions of exp and soul percents
* Fixed Deathlink sending deaths even if you turned deathlink off
* Fixed Mine of Judgment's music not randomizing
* Fixed extra Killer Clown souls being marked as useful instead of progression
* Fixed the HUD getting removed if you entered the bad ending room without defeating Aguni on Abyss+ goal
## Known Issues ##
* None so Far
cvdos1.2.1.title: Castlevania: Dawn of Sorrow Archipelago v1.2.1

cvdos1.3.description:
# Castlevania: Dawn of Sorrow Archipelago Version 1.3 #
## New Settings ##
``Randomize Soul Walls``: Randomizes which bullet souls are required to break the 4 red Soul Walls
``Randomize Synthesis Souls``: Randomizes which souls are required for weapon synth
``Free Bat``: Removes Bat Company's MP cost
## Changes ##
* Added a randomizer version number to the title screen
* Filler soul logic has been significantly adjusted and is now more cleanly checked for when not playing soulsanity (as in, logic will have you actually grind/get a soul instead of assuming it can be gotten)
* The Soulsanity bestiary now distinguishes between which Souls are and are not checks (and the percent display is updated accordingly)
* Removed the LV backdash jump from logic due to there being multiple options to reduce early bk now
* The Chaos Ring's chance of appearing has been raised from 1% to 10%
## Fixes ##
* Hopefully fixed more soul classes AGAIN
* Fixed EXP multiplier breaking when set too high
* Fixed starting soulsanity items not being logical
* Cleaned up some leftover logic in Subterranean Hell
## Known Issues ##
* None so Far
cvdos1.3.title: Castlevania: Dawn of Sorrow Archipelago v1.3

cvdos1.4.description:
# Castlevania: Dawn of Sorrow Archipelago Version 1.4 #
## New Settings ##
* ``Gate Items``: Adds keys for the 4 button gates. If it's set to Buttonsanity, the buttons themselves will have Checks, and will no longer open the gates.
* ``Passive Soul Eater Ring``: If enabled, you'll get the x2 soul chance bonus just by having the Soul Eater Ring in your inventory, without equipping it
* ``Hard Mode``: Puts the game in Hard Mode.
## Changes ##
* Added an extra logical divider in Subterranean Hell and Silenced Ruins
* Slightly tweaked some Soul regions
* Removed Mollusca, Frozen Shade, and Malacoda from the Soul Wall Pool
* Added a proper setup guide to the documentation
## Fixes ##
* Fixed the Osafune appearing as a Soul Can
* Fixed the Lost Village upper area still connecting to lower without speed boost(?)
## Known Issues ##
* None so Far
cvdos1.4.title: Castlevania: Dawn of Sorrow Archipelago v1.4
